attributes.additional_details: The ppl of this country deserve to be safe from these hate preachers..
attributes.background: Stop Anjem Choudary being released early to walk our streets hes a danger to society.He is known for radicalising ppl and has hatred towards this country and the ppl in it.Europe has had a big problem with terrorism lately and it is a disgrace that this man would be allowed to walk our streets again

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this isn't something that the UK Government and Parliament can do.

Decisions about releasing prisoners into the community are taken by the Parole Board, which is independent. The Government and Parliament can't change the Parole Board's decision.

The Government recently reviewed the process for Parole Board decisions. You can find out more about this here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/review-of-the-law-policy-and-procedure-relating-to-parole-board-decisions
